title: Used cars are hot sellers; demand fuelled by affordability, easy finance, COVID - CNBCTV18
content: Used cars are hot sellers; demand fuelled by affordability, easy finance, COVID  CNBCTV18
description: Owing to high demand, pre-owned car prices have risen 7-10% over 2020. But prices of cars nearing 10 years skidded as various states brought in policies to scrap older vehicles.
